body.p: Mr James Ward the father of the petitioner is in my office with a petition to your Excellency to have the fine remitted, mentioned in the petition I know the Boy who is fined and he is a clever Gentleman and is, as stated in the petition now sick with spinal affliction & it is not thought he can get well
It is a meritious case. I hope you will remit the fine when my friend Mr Ash calls on you if you please
Governor I dislike to importune you to do the favor but the old mans father will be here on Friday to get the Remit -- His sons property is to be sold on Saturday the next day
I have written this knowing as above stated that Young Ward a gentleman & deserves the Clemency of the Executive

I am yours
Truly
Thos H. Hawks
